version_description: 1.Repairing the crash error of synchronized video on the network disk

[improvement]
-Repair the occasional flash back problem of browsing network disk files
-Improve upnp device access
[new]
-Music file playback support, which can be transferred in through WiFi sharing and iTunes sharing
-Support image browsing
-Audio and video small window playback support
For more information, please go to https://sp-player.top/version

-提升局域网SMB加载速度
-修复一些崩溃错误

-Fix known crash errors
-Subtitle loading supports local selection

-Fix crash error reading iTunes
-Fix playback bar crash error
-Fix the crash of subtitle and image settings
-Improve the playback experience
